text: Very disappointing! A mother’s day dinner all spoiled! I placed order for Mother’s Day for the 2-pax menu to be delivered to my parents. I requested for 6-6.30pm dely time slot but the food didn’t arrive. There was not even any dely status update by phone or email. It’s only after I call the restaurant then was told the food will deliver around 7-7.15, which is abt 1 hour delay. I had to apologise to my parents for the wait and yhe delayed dinner. The food eventually arrived at 7.45pm and it was all cold. In between the restaurant did not even call to inform or apologise for the delay. Really very disappointed with the service😠

answers.text:
@ptna.lee Dear Patrina, thank you very much for your valuable feedback. We sincerely apologise for your negative experience with us - please be assured that we are reviewing this matter with our delivery partners. Due to a sudden surge in the demand, we experienced a shortage of drivers but are trying our best to deliver to all our customers. We seek your patience and understanding in this matter, and once again, we apologise. 
Sincerely, Social Place Singapore
